pullrequest.title: Fix removing multiple camera sensors that have the same camera name -> gazebo6

content.raw:
This is also failing for me:

~~~
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/gz_camera.cc:68: Failure
The difference between camera->GetWorldPose().pos.x and 9.9 is 5.5427655220031742, which exceeds 0.1, where
camera->GetWorldPose().pos.x evaluates to 4.3572344779968262,
9.9 evaluates to 9.9000000000000004, and
0.1 evaluates to 0.10000000000000001.
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/gz_camera.cc:69: Failure
The difference between camera->GetWorldPose().pos.y and 9.9 is 5.5427655220031742, which exceeds 0.1, where
camera->GetWorldPose().pos.y evaluates to 4.3572344779968262,
9.9 evaluates to 9.9000000000000004, and
0.1 evaluates to 0.10000000000000001.
~~~
